newsitem.title: BELGIUM: PETROFINA RISES 1.8% ON OIL PRICE, MARGINS.
newsitem.headline: PETROFINA RISES 1.8% ON OIL PRICE, MARGINS.

text.p: Belgian oil group PetroFina rose strongly in morning trade on the Brussels bourse on Wednesday, helped by buy recommendations on the back of firmer oil prices and better refining margins, dealers said.

Petrofina was up 170 Belgian francs, or 1.8 percent, at 9,640 francs at 1045 GMT. In an investment note, Bank BBL and brokerage unit Vermeulen-Raemdonck said PetroFina's fair value was probably nearer 10,900 francs.
"We have turned positive on PetroFina again," the brokerage said. It said it had revised up its 1996 profit forecast to 15.6 billion francs from 14 billion, or to 670 francs a share.
1997 earnings should lie between 700 and 740 francs, Vermeulen-Raemdonck said.
